title: MIcrosoft L60 | 2023 batch
content:
Education: Tier 3 Btech
Years of Experience: 1.5 YOE (2023 Batch)
Current Position:- Data Engineer at C2FO
Location:- WFH


Date of the Offer: December 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: Software Engineer L60
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: Base 21 LPA
Signing Bonus:2
Stock bonus: 40K USD (Over 4 years )
Performance Bonus: 0-20 %
Relocation Bonus - 3.8 LPA
First year comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 21 + 2 + 3.8 + 3.15 (taking 15 % as bonus ) + 8.6 (first year stock) = 38.5 LPA
Benefits: Whatever microsoft offers
